Atmosphere coding should never have a bad atmosphere.

“Exa-code is a major step towards eliminating LLM code hallucinations,” By Exa.

The Exa team has indexed over 1B+ document pages, GitHub repositories, Stack Overflow posts, and other content.

Given a query, exa-code performs hybrid searches on this data, chunks it, and returns a concatenated, token-efficient string. In Exa’s code hallucination evaluation, Exa-code outperformed all popular web search tools (including Exa itself!).
